articles.description: Louis van Gaal's side crashed out of the World Cup quarter-finals after a heroic comeback saw the game end 2-2 before the penalty shootout saw Argentina progress.
articles.content:
After Holland's penalty shootout defeat by Argentina, defender Virgil van Dijk has claimed that 'everything had gone in' for the Dutch players in penalty training.

articles.title: Yeovil Town 0-0 Scunthorpe United - BBC
articles.description: Scunthorpe end their six-game losing streak with a battling draw away to Yeovil.
articles.content:
Scunthorpe ended their six-game losing streak with a battling draw away to Yeovil in the National League.
